If there is confirmed case in a venue located in Hong Kong, the mobile app will notify those users who have visited the same venue at the same time with the infected person(s), thus increasing vigilance and self-protection awareness of citizens as well as enhancing public confidence in visiting different venues.

Upon confirmation by Centre for Health Protection of the Department of Health of The Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, app users who are confirmed positive or preliminary positive of COVID-19 infection can share their visit history with the Centre for Health Protection of the Department of Health to help trace the relevant contacts.

The mobile app allows the app users to store their Vaccine Pass records (e.g. COVID-19 vaccination records, vaccination medical exemption certificate and recovery record, provisional vaccine pass) and testing record. The mobile app automatic displays the app users selected Vaccine Pass QR code after scanning a venue QR code to facilitate the compliance with the “Vaccine Pass” measure. The Vaccine Pass QR code stored in the mobile app will be changed to red color if it is belonged to a COVID-19 infected person, and to amber code if it is belonged to a person under medical surveillance according to Department of Health’s records for the purpose of fighting the pandemic.

The mobile app also provides a Testing Registration Code function to enable app users to voluntarily store their personal information in advance. This function aims to reduce the time spent on queuing on-site and registration at testing points through a simplified registration process for app users to conduct COVID-19 nucleic acid testing if needed.

FEEL BETTER
Are you wondering how to get the most out of your sleep? It’s time to look beyond a new mattress or getting eight hours of shut eye and focus instead on your SLEEP DEBT.

Games that move you.

Active Arcade is a fresh take on how to get active while having fun, just by playing a few simple games. It puts you inside the game and uses your natural body movement as the game controller. Interactive elements will make you feel like you're immersed in an entirely new type of arcade game. It's a whole new world of play.

__

While we all want to be healthy, fitness today is expensive, rigorous, time-consuming, and intimidating. In short, “fitness” today is just too hard for many.

Active Arcade is an entirely different approach. It’s a simple, natural way to get active just by playing fun games that use your body movement. Like the casual sports games that we play on the playground as kids, there is no better way to have fun and get your body moving than by playing and competing in physical games. Active Arcade is built for anyone to get moving with only their mobile device—no expensive equipment, no hardcore routines, no wearables.

Even if just for a few minutes a day, moving through Active Arcade is both fun and good for you. Simply use your body to play fun physical games and activities, and get immersed in the gameplay. You won't even know you’re working up a sweat!

Don't exercise. Just play.

__

A NEW TYPE OF GAMEPLAY

Your body is now a video game controller! Active Arcade uses advanced full-body motion tracking powered by AI, combined with gamification and augmented reality (AR) to make the experience fun for everyone. The camera will digitize your movement and power the gameplay in real-time. 

SIMPLE SETUP, PLAY ANYWHERE

Active Arcade requires no special setup, wearables, or extra equipment. Just lean your iPhone or iPad against a stationary object like a chair, water bottle, or wall, and ensure the front-facing camera can see your full body.  For an even more immersive living room experience, connect your device to a TV through AirPlay or HDMI connection.

SOMETHING FOR EVERYONE

Active Arcade is simple and accessible so that people of all ages and every ability level can engage. The games are easy to play and don't require advanced athletic skills. There are more casual games like Reaction that focus on hand-eye coordination, and more full-body games like Box Attack that use your athleticism. A wide variety of games are available for every player, with new games added regularly.

FUN WITH FRIENDS AND FAMILY

Like real sports activities, Active Arcade games are about playing and moving with friends and family members. CAPTURE AND SHARE YOUR BEST MOVES

ENTIRELY FREE TO PLAY

咦？胖友你来了？

你这几天有听大家讨论从XXL到S码的秘诀吗？据说，不节食、不运动也能减肥哦！好像就是这个《柠檬轻断食》
 
你说什么是轻断食？那本喵就告诉你
‘轻断食’又叫‘间歇性断食’，是近些年来风靡一时的一种可以减肥的饮食方法哦~
轻断食它并不是节食，而是在一个期间内进行断食与进食循环的一种饮食模式。它不去规定你该吃或不该吃的食物，而是控制你进食的时间。敲重点：能瘦喔！

《柠檬轻断食》的作用：
【量身定制专属轻断食计划】
柠檬轻断食根据你录入的信息，为你量身定制，打造出一款简单、实用、专属于你的轻断食计划~在断食过程中，柠檬制作组将全程指引辅导，并给你提供记录追踪的功能。坚持下去，达到你的目的！
【DIY家居装扮】
除了那些有的没的，还可以装扮你的家~春夏假日风，唯美复古风，完成每日任务就可以获取漂亮的家具，来装扮你的可爱小家，让你努力的日子不再孤单。
【胖友圈】
胖友星人的秘密基地，在这里你可以邀请胖友伙伴们和你一起打卡互动，分享记录轻断食日常，还可以及时提醒胖友伙伴当前的体重、饮水、断食进度。
柠檬专属贴贴功能上线，把胖友们的温馨提醒贴在桌面上吧，时刻监督和记录，随时随地分享新状态！
【断食追踪】
柠檬轻断食根据你的计划进行断食追踪，提醒你当前应该进食还是断食，什么时间开始、什么时间结束，你的每一次的断食数据都做到一目了然~同时可以追踪你断食期间的身体变化！
【食谱推荐】
不需要花大量精力寻找食谱，不需要费劲巴拉计算食物热量，我们都有！更不需要严格缩减你的美食库，你可以吃！柠檬制作组根据你的断食计划，为你推荐每一餐的掉秤食谱，快速收获好身材~你也可以将食谱更换为想吃的食物，记得不要吃太多哦！吃饭有当美女重要吗？！！！
【每日记录】
你可以记录饮食、记录饮水量、记录体重、记录身体状态，一步一步见证你蜕变逆袭的过程！

你的数据帮助你了解不同阶段的身体状态，让你随时记录查看身体数据，可视化你的断食过程并跟踪断食和体重的每日变化。
【饮水提醒】
水可以提高你的代谢，让你快速变苗条。定时通知，智能提醒，柠檬提醒你，该补水了哦~
【个性化断食计划】
柠檬轻断食涵盖当今热门的多种轻断食计划，如：12-12、14-10、16-8、18-6、20-4、23-1、6-1、5-2、10in2，以及3种自定义计划，满足你的多种个性化需求。
【饮食红黑榜】
敲黑板！！学会正确饮食，真的每天嘎嘎掉秤 ！
【吃什么盲盒】
早上吃什么？中午吃什么？晚上吃什么？拜托！别再为难干饭人了！快来柠檬炫酷盲盒机一键体验，打开快落饮食新方式，让你告别减肥星人不知道吃什么的烦恼，盲盒未知的惊喜和快感！
【大姨妈记录】
姨妈日期记不清，被突袭手忙脚乱？柠檬大姨妈记录功能上线，智能预估经期，推算排卵，随时随地提醒每位小仙女，贴心守护更安心哦！
